meanings.definition: The manner in which one conducts oneself; behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her deportment at the party was polite and friendly.
meanings.sent2: Good deportment is important in a job interview.
meanings.sent3: His silly deportment made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her confident deportment was like that of a queen.
meanings.sent5: The teacher praised her deportment in class.

meanings.definition: The way in which a person stands and moves; posture.
meanings.sent1: His deportment while dancing was graceful and elegant.
meanings.sent2: Proper deportment is crucial for a ballet dancer.
meanings.sent3: His awkward deportment on the ice rink was endearing.
meanings.sent4: The soldier's deportment was as straight as a rod.
meanings.sent5: She practiced her deportment in front of the mirror.
